name: The Stock Tip Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Elaine boyfriend during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Robert.

	This is Elaine's second boyfriend during he series.  Elaine can't even go into his apartment.

questions.text: What type of animal does Elaine's new boyfriend own?
questions.explanation:
Cat.

	Robert owns two cats, and this causes a problem for Elaine because she is allergic to cats.

questions.text: Who is Jerry's girlfriend during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Vanessa.

	Vanessa was one of the few examples of women that Jerry has dated in a previous episode.  We first see Vanessa in the episode "The Stake Out".

questions.text: What is Kramer's innovative invention in this episode?
options: The cologne that smells like the beach
questions.explanation:
The roll-out tie dispenser.

	After Jerry begins losing money in the stocks he and George invested in, Kramer suggests that Jerry invest into the new roll-out tie dispenser created by his company "Kramerica".

questions.text: Where is Jerry planning on taking his girlfriend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Vermont.

	Vanessa is hesitant about moving into "Phase 2" of Jerry's and her relationship, but she and Jerry decide to go away for a three day weekend to Vermont.

questions.text: What happens to Jerry's shirt at the dry cleaners?
questions.explanation:
It shrinks.

	Jerry gets mad at the store owner because of the shrunken shirt, but the owner won't accept the fact because Jerry doesn't have his receipt.

questions.text: Who originally persuades Jerry to buy the stock?
questions.explanation:
George.

	George has doubts after the stock plunges many points, and his adviser is sent to the hospital.

questions.text: How many points does the stock rise during Jerry's vacation with his girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	If Jerry had kept his shares, his stock would have been four thousand dollars higher, but after it fell too much, he left it.

questions.text: Why is George's stock adviser, Mr. Wilkenson, in the hospital?
questions.explanation:
Nose job.

	George ended up earning eight thousand dollars on his stock, and Jerry had to leave Vanessa after the Vermont trip.

questions.text: Does Elaine leave her boyfriend in the end of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	After telling him to choose between her and his cats, Robert chose the cats and Elaine had to leave him.
